title: Setlist: These Are The Songs Metallica Is Performing Live In 2017 [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 3 hours ago 4 Today in Seoul, South Korea, Metallica debuted new tracks " Now That We're Dead " and " Halo on Fire " live in concert.Fan-filmed footage from the Gocheok Sky Dome was quick to surface online, you can check it out below, along with the night's setlist.During a recent appearance on the Nerdist Podcast, James and Kirk said to expect around 50 live shows from the gang during this year."My body has told me to tell these guys that 50 shows a year is kind of what we can do, so make the best of those," Hetfield explained. "And I think we all kind of agree in that. But 50 shows a year, that's pretty good. My body can handle that. Body, mind and spirit all need to kind of revitalize themselves at home, and days off for voices - things like that - so 50 shows a year, it goes pretty quick, I'm sure." Metallica setlist Seoul 2017
